```shell
curl 'https://partner.system.netsalesmedia.pl/api/user/login' \
  -H 'authority: partner.system.netsalesmedia.pl' \
  -H 'pragma: no-cache' \
  -H 'cache-control: no-cache' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua: " Not A;Brand";v="99", "Chromium";v="96", "Google Chrome";v="96"' \
  -H 'x-ig-changeset: a023a4be64bb3951eb5619ab99e24774d5dbdb73' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
  -H 'user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/96.0.4664.110 Safari/537.36' \
  -H 'content-type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
  -H 'accept: application/json, text/plain, */*' \
  -H 'x-ig-token: null' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-platform: "Linux"' \
  -H 'origin: https://partner.system.netsalesmedia.pl' \
  -H 'sec-fetch-site: same-origin' \
  -H 'sec-fetch-mode: cors' \
  -H 'sec-fetch-dest: empty' \
  -H 'referer: https://partner.system.netsalesmedia.pl/app/index.html' \
  -H 'accept-language: en,zh-CN;q=0.9,zh;q=0.8' \
  -H 'cookie: ; _etid=ca7b4c0259fabf7b32f45821fb71b5689ac04244; sso=eyJhcGlCYXNlVXJsIjoiYXBpLnN5c3RlbS5uZXRzYWxlc21lZGlhLnBsIiwibG9naW4iOnsidHlwZSI6IlBBUlRORVIiLCJ1c2VybmFtZSI6Im5zbS5wYXJ0bmVyc0BicmFuZHJld2FyZC5jb20iLCJ1c2VySWQiOjQ5NjIyMywic2VjcmV0IjoiJDJ5JDEwJEJFNTFGc011WkZGYWdobHVSXC9TRVEuOGVNMDQzXC9qNUJuOE5veERzcWlhRzFHXC9yUUV6V0NlIn19; sso_logout=logout; IGT_PARTNER=7c4c6a03f3250c728a845525d5e7b3ad' \
  --data-raw '{"username":"nsm.partners@brandreward.com","password":"q9Js&TaC=^"}' \
  --compressed
```
